Markdown

April 16, 2016

cheat-sheet

Markdown syntax  
new paragraph two spaces at the end of the line
*italic* / _italic_ ITALIC
**bold** / __bold__ BOLD
~~striped~~ STRIPED
monospace (triple backticks for blocks) MONOSPACE
LaTeX (ipython notebook): $ e^{i \pi} = -1 $ ($$ for block) $e^{i \pi} = -1$
[link](http://www "tips") link
! [alt_text](http:...) "popup"
horizontal lines — or *** or ___
#Header1 ##Header2 etc headers

Lists & numbered lists

* First level 
 - Second level 
   - Third level

1. First level
2. Second level 
 1. Sublevel

Blocks

Monospace blocks: surrounded by code ``` Quotation blocks: starts with > > quotation

Tables:
| TABLE | OK?| |------:|:---| | row1 | ok |

References

  • https://help.github.com/articles/markdown-basics/
Notes and blog entries around Data Science and related topics
